overview: We've got the cream of the crop in this all star remix of only the hippest and hottest girls in the business! With a cast that features Amy Ried, Shyla Stylez, Dana Vespoli, Belladonna, Carmen Luvana, Brandy Talore, and more, you'll be blown away as you watch these babes get taken advantage of in every way. You don't want to miss out on this collector's dream, because when push comes to shove, there's nothing better than the fantasy all-star team.
title: Fantasy All-Stars 3
